languages.text: "Это называется справедливость. За каждую сломанную кость. За каждый плевок в душу. Пусть будет проклята!"

traits.locale_text: "Это называется справедливость. За каждую сломанную кость. За каждый плевок в душу. Пусть будет проклята!"

languages.text: "That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"
languages.original_text: "Это называется справедливость. За каждую сломанную кость. За каждый плевок в душу. Пусть будет проклята!"

traits.locale_text: "This is called justice. For every broken bone, for every spit in the face. May she be damned!"
"This is called justice. For every broken bone, for every spit in the face. May she be damned!"
"This is called justice. For every broken bone, for every gob of spit in the face, may she be damned!"
"This is called justice. For every broken bone, for every gob of spit in the face, may she be damned!"
"That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"
"That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"

languages.text: "Das nennt man Gerechtigkeit. Für jeden gebrochenen Knochen, für jedes Mal Anspucken. Auf Nimmerwiedersehen!"
languages.original_text: "That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"

traits.locale_text: "Das nennt man Gerechtigkeit. Für jeden gebrochenen Knochen, für jedes Mal Anspucken. Auf Nimmerwiedersehen!"

languages.text: «Eso es justicia, por cada hueso roto y por cada esputo en nuestras caras. ¡Le está bien empleado!».
languages.original_text: "That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"

traits.locale_text: «Eso es justicia, por cada hueso roto y por cada esputo en nuestras caras. ¡Le está bien empleado!».

languages.text: 「それが正義ってもんだ…折られた骨全部、顔に吐かれたつば全部に対するな。最高の厄介払いだよ！」
languages.original_text: "That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"

traits.locale_text: 「それが正義ってもんだ…折られた骨全部、顔に吐かれたつば全部に対するな。最高の厄介払いだよ！」

languages.text: “这就是正义，为了每根被打断的骨头，为了吐在我们脸上的每口唾沫！那个贱人终于死了！”
languages.original_text: "That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"

traits.locale_text: “这就是正义，为了每根被打断的骨头，为了吐在我们脸上的每口唾沫！那个贱人终于死了！”

languages.text: « C'est ce qu'on appelle la justice : pour chaque os brisé, pour chaque fois qu'on s'est fait cracher au visage. Bon débarras ! »
languages.original_text: "That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est ce qu'on appelle la justice : pour chaque os brisé, pour chaque fois qu'on s'est fait cracher au visage. Bon débarras ! »

languages.text: "Buna adalet derler. Kırılan her bir kemiğin, yüzümüze atılan her bir tükürüğün cezası. Sonunda kurtulduk be!"
languages.original_text: "That's called justice — for every broken bone, for every gob of spit in our faces. Good bloody riddance!"
